content.FMOD_load_err: FMOD failed to load correctly. All music related features will not work properly. Please check file integrity.
content.FMOD_create_sys_err:
FMOD failed to create the system.
 Error:
content.autoupdate_err: Update check error. Please check network connection to Github page.
content.anno_show_bar: Display in Bar instead of Time
content.anno_show_bar_warn:
You have not set global Bar Per Minute and Offset. Could not toggle Bar/Time display.
Use F6 to set up.
content.anno_hide_scoreboard: Hide score display in edit mode
content.anno_switch_sidetype_warn: You can toggle the side type only if you are editing the side.
content.anno_note_speed_warn: You are now missing at a speed of x0.2. Low drop speed can cause severe performance problems.
content.old_version_warn_1:
Project from a specific old version have been detected.
Does the beatmap use a delay of 64ms when importing timing information from .osu?
This delay is proposed to be revoked in a new version. If you choose “Yes”, then all places of Note and Timing Point will be pre-64ms.
Before adjusting we recommend you to backup the .dyn file. You can also adjust it manually.
This warning will not appear again.
content.new_project_warn: Are you sure you want to create a new project? All unsaved changes will be lost.
content.box_add_offset: Please enter the global time offset you want to add (in milliseconds, positive numbers increase delays). This will affect the time of all Timing Points and Notes.
content.box_set_global_bar_1: Please enter a custom global Bar Per Minute
content.box_set_global_bar_2: Please enter a global Offset (milliseconds) for Bar display and export
content.anno_set_global_bar_complete: Changed global BarPM and Offset to
content.anno_graph_not_exists:
Image file does not exist.

content.anno_graph_load_err: Image file read failed. The image may be too large or corrupted.
content.anno_music_load_err:
Music file loading failed, possibly due to type not supported or file corrupted.

content.box_q_osu_import_objects: Import items in .osu file? (Would you like to do a conversion?)
content.box_q_clear_objects: Clear all original beatmap items? This cannot be undone!
content.box_q_import_dymm_bpm: Would you like to import the BPM information in the Dynamaker Modified Beatmap file?
content.anno_chart_not_exists: Beatmap file does not exist. Import aborted.
content.box_q_import_confirm: Are you sure you want to import the beatmap? All actions will be irreversible.
content.box_q_import_clear: Clear all the original beatmap items?
content.box_q_import_timing_reset: Do you want to reset all timing information?
content.confirm_close: Are you sure you want to quit? All unsaved progress will be lost.
content.timing_point_create_with_note_question: It has been detected that you have selected a Note, which time: $0 ms. Do you want to use this time as offset?
content.export_fix_decimal_question:
导出时是否将导出的所有音符时间对毫秒取整？
使用该功能导出后的谱面将无法在再次导入后正常编辑。
content.export_to_dym_question:
Export relevant information for Dynamaker-modified? Use this option to export the beatmap only for editor editing.
If "Yes" is chosen, all set Bar information will be overridden by DyNode.
content.export_timing_error: You haven't configured Timing, so you can't export beatmap yet.
content.error_config_file_corrupted: Bad configuration file detected. Restore all configurations to default.
content.anno_reload_config: The configuration has been reloaded. A reboot may be required to take effect.
content.start_page_hint:
F7: Toggle borderless fullscreen
F12: View all shortcuts
DyNode currently only supports rendering resolution 1920x1080.
content.error_dym_note_load_failed:
导入谱面音符时出错，导入过程已终止。
建议使用最新版本的 Dynamaker-modified 来导出谱面，你也可以选择向开发者反馈该错误。
content.error_dym_bpm_load_failed:
未能读取谱面中的变 BPM 信息。
建议使用最新版本的 Dynamaker-modified 来导出谱面的变 BPM 数据。
content.error_default_width_must_be_real: The default width entered must be a real number.
content.tpc_extra_question: It has been detected that you have selected a Note, which time: $0 ms. Do you want to use this time as offset?
content.add_timing_point:
Add Timing Point to $0
BPM: $1
beats: $2/4
content.remove_timing_point:
Delete Timing Point at $0
BPM: $1
beats: $2/4
content.copy_timing_point:
Duplicate the last Timing Point to $0
BPM: $1
BP: $2/4
content.error_no_timing_point: You haven't set any Timing Point yet. Press Y to place at least one Timing Point.
content.warning_note_outbound:
You are placing a note from the center that exceeds the screen.
The note may not be visible on the screen and will not be editable later.
You can use a redo to go back to the previous state.
content.warning_notes_rotate: Only LR side notes can be rotated.
content.warning_notes_rotate_copy: Only LR side notes can be rotated and copied.

content.video_playback_open_timeout: Loading video file timeout. The video file may not be supported.
content.bar_calibration_question: Beatmap's bar not configured. Configure Bar by the recommended default method?
content.bar_calibration_warning:
检测到谱面包含多个 Timing Point 。
DyNode 将以第一个 Timing Point 为准对 Bar 进行配置。
DyNode 目前不支持变 BPM 的 Bar 配置。
content.bar_calibration_complete:
Bar is configured by default: 
Bar Per Minute: $0
Bar Offset: $1
content.bar_reset_question: You have set Bar on the beatmap already. Do you want to remove the Bar configuration?
